# WeatherMate App

## Project Description
WeatherMate is a weather forecasting application that provides real-time
weather information such as temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
for different locations. The application helps users easily access accurate
and up-to-date weather details.

## Project Type
Group Academic Project

## Developed By
Surbhi Pandey (BCA Final Year Student)

## My Contribution
This project was developed as a group academic project.
My role primarily focused on:
- Understanding the overall application workflow
- Working on weather API integration concepts
- Frontend flow and user interface understanding
- Testing the application and validating results
- Documentation and project explanation

## Features
- Real-time weather updates
- Location-based weather search
- Displays temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
- Simple and user-friendly interface

## Technologies Used
- Python / JavaScript (as applicable)
- Weather API
- HTML, CSS
- Flask / Django / React (as used in the project)

## Project Status
Academic Project (Completed)
